content: **crocheted drops napkin easter decoration in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50 g color no 01 off white 50 g color no 24 yellow 50 g color no 35 lime drops crochet hook size 5 mm \ us h/8 or the size needed to obtain 13 single_crochet = 4 in width uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3645&cid=19
